subpods.title: Possible intermediate steps

img.alt:
Solve Chini's equation t^2 ( dy(t))/( dt) + 2 t y(t) = t^4 y(t)^2 + 4:
Subtract 2 t y(t) from both sides:
t^2 ( dy(t))/( dt) = t^4 y(t)^2 - 2 t y(t) + 4
Divide both sides by t^2:
( dy(t))/( dt) = 4/t^2 + t^2 y(t)^2 - (2 y(t))/t
For the Chini equation ( dy(t))/( dt) = y(t)^n f(t) + y(t) g(t) + h(t), when α = f(t)^(-n - 1) h(t)^(-2 n + 1) ((n f(t) g(t) + f'(t)) h(t) - f(t) h'(t))^n is independent of t, the substitution y(t) = (h(t)/f(t))^(1/n) v(t) leads to a separable equation.
In this case n = 2, f(t) = t^2, g(t) = -2/t, h(t) = 4/t^2 and α = 0.
Since α = 0 is independent of t, substitute y(t) = v(t)/t^2 and ( dy(t))/( dt) = (t ( dv(t))/( dt) - 2 v(t))/t^3:
(t ( dv(t))/( dt) - 2 v(t))/t^3 = 4/t^2 + v(t)^2/t^2 - (2 v(t))/t^3
Solve for ( dv(t))/( dt):
( dv(t))/( dt) = v(t)^2 + 4
Divide both sides by v(t)^2 + 4:
(( dv(t))/( dt))/(v(t)^2 + 4) = 1
Integrate both sides with respect to t:
 integral(( dv(t))/( dt))/(v(t)^2 + 4) dt = integral1 dt
Evaluate the integrals:
1/2 tan^(-1)(v(t)/2) = t + c_1, where c_1 is an arbitrary constant.
Solve for v(t):
v(t) = 2 tan(2 (t + c_1))
Substitute back for y(t) = v(t)/t^2:
Answer: | 
 | y(t) = (2 tan(2 (t + c_1)))/t^2
img.title:
Solve Chini's equation t^2 ( dy(t))/( dt) + 2 t y(t) = t^4 y(t)^2 + 4:
Subtract 2 t y(t) from both sides:
t^2 ( dy(t))/( dt) = t^4 y(t)^2 - 2 t y(t) + 4
Divide both sides by t^2:
( dy(t))/( dt) = 4/t^2 + t^2 y(t)^2 - (2 y(t))/t
For the Chini equation ( dy(t))/( dt) = y(t)^n f(t) + y(t) g(t) + h(t), when α = f(t)^(-n - 1) h(t)^(-2 n + 1) ((n f(t) g(t) + f'(t)) h(t) - f(t) h'(t))^n is independent of t, the substitution y(t) = (h(t)/f(t))^(1/n) v(t) leads to a separable equation.
In this case n = 2, f(t) = t^2, g(t) = -2/t, h(t) = 4/t^2 and α = 0.
Since α = 0 is independent of t, substitute y(t) = v(t)/t^2 and ( dy(t))/( dt) = (t ( dv(t))/( dt) - 2 v(t))/t^3:
(t ( dv(t))/( dt) - 2 v(t))/t^3 = 4/t^2 + v(t)^2/t^2 - (2 v(t))/t^3
Solve for ( dv(t))/( dt):
( dv(t))/( dt) = v(t)^2 + 4
Divide both sides by v(t)^2 + 4:
(( dv(t))/( dt))/(v(t)^2 + 4) = 1
Integrate both sides with respect to t:
 integral(( dv(t))/( dt))/(v(t)^2 + 4) dt = integral1 dt
Evaluate the integrals:
1/2 tan^(-1)(v(t)/2) = t + c_1, where c_1 is an arbitrary constant.
Solve for v(t):
v(t) = 2 tan(2 (t + c_1))
Substitute back for y(t) = v(t)/t^2:
Answer: | 
 | y(t) = (2 tan(2 (t + c_1)))/t^2

subpods.plaintext:
Solve Chini's equation t^2 ( dy(t))/( dt) + 2 t y(t) = t^4 y(t)^2 + 4:
Subtract 2 t y(t) from both sides:
t^2 ( dy(t))/( dt) = t^4 y(t)^2 - 2 t y(t) + 4
Divide both sides by t^2:
( dy(t))/( dt) = 4/t^2 + t^2 y(t)^2 - (2 y(t))/t
For the Chini equation ( dy(t))/( dt) = y(t)^n f(t) + y(t) g(t) + h(t), when α = f(t)^(-n - 1) h(t)^(-2 n + 1) ((n f(t) g(t) + f'(t)) h(t) - f(t) h'(t))^n is independent of t, the substitution y(t) = (h(t)/f(t))^(1/n) v(t) leads to a separable equation.
In this case n = 2, f(t) = t^2, g(t) = -2/t, h(t) = 4/t^2 and α = 0.
Since α = 0 is independent of t, substitute y(t) = v(t)/t^2 and ( dy(t))/( dt) = (t ( dv(t))/( dt) - 2 v(t))/t^3:
(t ( dv(t))/( dt) - 2 v(t))/t^3 = 4/t^2 + v(t)^2/t^2 - (2 v(t))/t^3
Solve for ( dv(t))/( dt):
( dv(t))/( dt) = v(t)^2 + 4
Divide both sides by v(t)^2 + 4:
(( dv(t))/( dt))/(v(t)^2 + 4) = 1
Integrate both sides with respect to t:
 integral(( dv(t))/( dt))/(v(t)^2 + 4) dt = integral1 dt
Evaluate the integrals:
1/2 tan^(-1)(v(t)/2) = t + c_1, where c_1 is an arbitrary constant.
Solve for v(t):
v(t) = 2 tan(2 (t + c_1))
Substitute back for y(t) = v(t)/t^2:
Answer: | 
 | y(t) = (2 tan(2 (t + c_1)))/t^2
subpods.mathml:
<math xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML'
    mathematica:form='StandardForm'
    xmlns:mathematica='http://www.wolfram.com/XML/'>
 <mtable displaystyle='true'>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mrow>
     <mrow>
      <mtext>Solve Chini's equation </mtext>
      <mrow>
       <mrow>
        <mrow>
         <mrow>
          <mrow>
           <msup>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mn>2</mn>
           </msup>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <mfrac>
            <mrow>
             <mi>d</mi>
             <mo>⁢</mo>
             <mrow>
              <mi>y</mi>
              <mo>⁡</mo>
              <mo>(</mo>
              <mi>t</mi>
              <mo>)</mo>
             </mrow>
            </mrow>
            <mrow>
             <mi>d</mi>
             <mo>⁢</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
            </mrow>
           </mfrac>
          </mrow>
          <mo>+</mo>
          <mrow>
           <mn>2</mn>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <mi>t</mi>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <mrow>
            <mi>y</mi>
            <mo>⁡</mo>
            <mo>(</mo>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mo>)</mo>
           </mrow>
          </mrow>
         </mrow>
         <mo>=</mo>
         <mrow>
          <mrow>
           <msup>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mn>4</mn>
           </msup>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <msup>
            <mrow>
             <mi>y</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <mn>2</mn>
           </msup>
          </mrow>
          <mo>+</mo>
          <mn>4</mn>
         </mrow>
        </mrow>
       </mrow>
      </mrow>
     </mrow>
     <mo>:</mo>
    </mrow>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtable displaystyle='true'>
     <mtr>
      <mtd>
       <mrow>
        <mtext>Subtract </mtext>
        <mrow>
         <mrow>
          <mn>2</mn>
          <mo>⁢</mo>
          <mi>t</mi>
          <mo>⁢</mo>
          <mrow>
           <mi>y</mi>
           <mo>⁡</mo>
           <mo>(</mo>
           <mi>t</mi>
           <mo>)</mo>
          </mrow>
         </mrow>
         <mtext> </mtext>
        </mrow>
        <mtext>from </mtext>
        <mtext>both </mtext>
        <mtext>sides:</mtext>
       </mrow>
      </mtd>
     </mtr>
     <mtr>
      <mtd>
       <mrow>
        <mrow>
         <mrow>
          <msup>
           <mi>t</mi>
           <mn>2</mn>
          </msup>
          <mo>⁢</mo>
          <mfrac>
           <mrow>
            <mi>d</mi>
            <mo>⁢</mo>
            <mrow>
             <mi>y</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
           </mrow>
           <mrow>
            <mi>d</mi>
            <mo>⁢</mo>
            <mi>t</mi>
           </mrow>
          </mfrac>
         </mrow>
         <mo>=</mo>
         <mrow>
          <mrow>
           <msup>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mn>4</mn>
           </msup>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <msup>
            <mrow>
             <mi>y</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <mn>2</mn>
           </msup>
          </mrow>
          <mo>-</mo>
          <mrow>
           <mn>2</mn>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <mi>t</mi>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <mrow>
            <mi>y</mi>
            <mo>⁡</mo>
            <mo>(</mo>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mo>)</mo>
           </mrow>
          </mrow>
          <mo>+</mo>
          <mn>4</mn>
         </mrow>
        </mrow>
       </mrow>
      </mtd>
     </mtr>
    </mtable>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtable displaystyle='true'>
     <mtr>
      <mtd>
       <mrow>
        <mrow>
         <mtext>Divide </mtext>
         <mtext>both </mtext>
         <mtext>sides </mtext>
         <mtext>by </mtext>
         <mrow>
          <msup>
           <mi>t</mi>
           <mn>2</mn>
          </msup>
         </mrow>
        </mrow>
        <mo>:</mo>
       </mrow>
      </mtd>
     </mtr>
     <mtr>
      <mtd>
       <mrow>
        <mrow>
         <mfrac>
          <mrow>
           <mi>d</mi>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <mrow>
            <mi>y</mi>
            <mo>⁡</mo>
            <mo>(</mo>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mo>)</mo>
           </mrow>
          </mrow>
          <mrow>
           <mi>d</mi>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <mi>t</mi>
          </mrow>
         </mfrac>
         <mo>=</mo>
         <mrow>
          <mfrac>
           <mn>4</mn>
           <msup>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mn>2</mn>
           </msup>
          </mfrac>
          <mo>+</mo>
          <mrow>
           <msup>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mn>2</mn>
           </msup>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <msup>
            <mrow>
             <mi>y</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <mn>2</mn>
           </msup>
          </mrow>
          <mo>-</mo>
          <mfrac>
           <mrow>
            <mn>2</mn>
            <mo>⁢</mo>
            <mrow>
             <mi>y</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
           </mrow>
           <mi>t</mi>
          </mfrac>
         </mrow>
        </mrow>
       </mrow>
      </mtd>
     </mtr>
    </mtable>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtable displaystyle='true'>
     <mtr>
      <mtd>
       <mrow>
        <mtext>For </mtext>
        <mtext>the </mtext>
        <mrow>
         <mi>Chini</mi>
         <mtext> </mtext>
        </mrow>
        <mtext>equation </mtext>
        <mrow>
         <mrow>
          <mfrac>
           <mrow>
            <mi>d</mi>
            <mo>⁢</mo>
            <mrow>
             <mi>y</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
           </mrow>
           <mrow>
            <mi>d</mi>
            <mo>⁢</mo>
            <mi>t</mi>
           </mrow>
          </mfrac>
          <mo>=</mo>
          <mrow>
           <mrow>
            <msup>
             <mrow>
              <mi>y</mi>
              <mo>⁡</mo>
              <mo>(</mo>
              <mi>t</mi>
              <mo>)</mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>n</mi>
            </msup>
            <mo>⁢</mo>
            <mrow>
             <mi>f</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
           </mrow>
           <mo>+</mo>
           <mrow>
            <mrow>
             <mi>y</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <mo>⁢</mo>
            <mrow>
             <mi>g</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
           </mrow>
           <mo>+</mo>
           <mrow>
            <mi>h</mi>
            <mo>⁡</mo>
            <mo>(</mo>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mo>)</mo>
           </mrow>
          </mrow>
         </mrow>
         <mo>,</mo>
         <mtext> </mtext>
        </mrow>
        <mtext>when </mtext>
        <mrow>
         <mrow>
          <mi>α</mi>
          <mo>=</mo>
          <mrow>
           <msup>
            <mrow>
             <mi>f</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <mrow>
             <mrow>
              <mo>-</mo>
              <mi>n</mi>
             </mrow>
             <mo>-</mo>
             <mn>1</mn>
            </mrow>
           </msup>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <msup>
            <mrow>
             <mi>h</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <mrow>
             <mrow>
              <mo>-</mo>
              <mn>2</mn>
              <mo>⁢</mo>
              <mi>n</mi>
             </mrow>
             <mo>+</mo>
             <mn>1</mn>
            </mrow>
           </msup>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <msup>
            <mrow>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mrow>
              <mrow>
               <mrow>
                <mo>(</mo>
                <mrow>
                 <mrow>
                  <mi>n</mi>
                  <mo>⁢</mo>
                  <mrow>
                   <mi>f</mi>
                   <mo>⁡</mo>
                   <mo>(</mo>
                   <mi>t</mi>
                   <mo>)</mo>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo>⁢</mo>
                  <mrow>
                   <mi>g</mi>
                   <mo>⁡</mo>
                   <mo>(</mo>
                   <mi>t</mi>
                   <mo>)</mo>
                  </mrow>
                 </mrow>
                 <mo>+</mo>
                 <mrow>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>f</mi>
                   <mo>,</mo>
                  </msup>
                  <mo>(</mo>
                  <mi>t</mi>
                  <mo>)</mo>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
                <mo>)</mo>
               </mrow>
               <mo>⁢</mo>
               <mrow>
                <mi>h</mi>
                <mo>⁡</mo>
                <mo>(</mo>
                <mi>t</mi>
                <mo>)</mo>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mo>-</mo>
              <mrow>
               <mrow>
                <mi>f</mi>
                <mo>⁡</mo>
                <mo>(</mo>
                <mi>t</mi>
                <mo>)</mo>
               </mrow>
               <mo>⁢</mo>
               <mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>h</mi>
                 <mo>,</mo>
                </msup>
                <mo>(</mo>
                <mi>t</mi>
                <mo>)</mo>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
             </mrow>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <mi>n</mi>
           </msup>
          </mrow>
         </mrow>
         <mtext> </mtext>
        </mrow>
        <mtext>is </mtext>
        <mtext>independent </mtext>
        <mtext>of </mtext>
        <mrow>
         <mi>t</mi>
         <mo>,</mo>
         <mtext> </mtext>
        </mrow>
        <mtext>the </mtext>
        <mtext>substitution </mtext>
        <mrow>
         <mrow>
          <mrow>
           <mi>y</mi>
           <mo>⁡</mo>
           <mo>(</mo>
           <mi>t</mi>
           <mo>)</mo>
          </mrow>
          <mo>=</mo>
          <mrow>
           <msup>
            <mrow>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mfrac>
              <mrow>
               <mi>h</mi>
               <mo>⁡</mo>
               <mo>(</mo>
               <mi>t</mi>
               <mo>)</mo>
              </mrow>
              <mrow>
               <mi>f</mi>
               <mo>⁡</mo>
               <mo>(</mo>
               <mi>t</mi>
               <mo>)</mo>
              </mrow>
             </mfrac>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <mrow>
             <mrow>
              <mn>1</mn>
              <mo>/</mo>
              <mi>n</mi>
             </mrow>
            </mrow>
           </msup>
           <mo>⁢</mo>
           <mrow>
            <mi>v</mi>
            <mo>⁡</mo>
            <mo>(</mo>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mo>)</mo>
           </mrow>
          </mrow>
         </mrow>
         <mtext> </mtext>
        </mrow>
        <mtext>leads </mtext>
        <mtext>to </mtext>
        <mtext>a </mtext>
        <mtext>separable </mtext>
        <mtext>equation.</mtext>
       </mrow>
      </mtd>
     </mtr>
     <mtr>
      <mtd>
       <mrow>
        <mrow>
         <mtext>In this case </mtext>
         <mrow>
          <mrow>
           <mrow>
            <mrow>
             <mi>n</mi>
             <mo>=</mo>
             <mn>2</mn>
            </mrow>
            <mo>,</mo>
            <mrow>
             <mrow>
              <mi>f</mi>
              <mo>⁡</mo>
              <mo>(</mo>
              <mi>t</mi>
              <mo>)</mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>=</mo>
             <msup>
              <mi>t</mi>
              <mn>2</mn>
             </msup>
            </mrow>
            <mo>,</mo>
            <mrow>
             <mrow>
              <mi>g</mi>
              <mo>⁡</mo>
              <mo>(</mo>
              <mi>t</mi>
              <mo>)</mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>=</mo>
             <mrow>
              <mo>-</mo>
              <mfrac>
               <mn>2</mn>
               <mi>t</mi>
              </mfrac>
             </mrow>
            </mrow>
            <mo>,</mo>
            <mrow>
             <mrow>
              <mi>h</mi>
              <mo>⁡</mo>
              <mo>(</mo>
              <mi>t</mi>
              <mo>)</mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>=</mo>
             <mfrac>
              <mn>4</mn>
              <msup>
               <mi>t</mi>
               <mn>2</mn>
              </msup>
             </mfrac>
            </mrow>
           </mrow>
           <mtext> </mtext>
          </mrow>
          <mtext>and </mtext>
          <mrow>
           <mi>α</mi>
           <mo>=</mo>
           <mn>0</mn>
          </mrow>
         </mrow>
         <mo>.</mo>
        </mrow>
       </mrow>
      </mtd>
     </mtr>
    </mtable>
   </mtd>
  </mtr>
  <mtr>
   <mtd>
    <mtable displaystyle='true'>
     <mtr>
      <mtd>
       <mrow>
        <mrow>
         <mtext>Since </mtext>
         <mrow>
          <mrow>
           <mi>α</mi>
           <mo>=</mo>
           <mn>0</mn>
          </mrow>
          <mtext> </mtext>
         </mrow>
         <mtext>is </mtext>
         <mtext>independent </mtext>
         <mtext>of </mtext>
         <mrow>
          <mi>t</mi>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mtext> </mtext>
         </mrow>
         <mtext>substitute </mtext>
         <mrow>
          <mrow>
           <mrow>
            <mi>y</mi>
            <mo>⁡</mo>
            <mo>(</mo>
            <mi>t</mi>
            <mo>)</mo>
           </mrow>
           <mo>=</mo>
           <mfrac>
            <mrow>
             <mi>v</mi>
             <mo>⁡</mo>
             <mo>(</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mo>)</mo>
            </mrow>
            <msup>
             <mi>t</mi>
             <mn>2</mn>
            </msup>
           </mfrac>
          </mrow>
          <mtext> </mtext>
         </mrow>
         <mtext>and </mtext>
         <mrow>
          <mrow>
           <mfrac>
            <mrow>
             <mi>d</mi>
             <mo>⁢</mo>
             <mrow>
              <mi>y</mi>
              <mo>⁡</mo>
              <mo>(</mo>
              <mi>t</mi>
              <mo>)</mo>
             </mrow>
            </mrow>
            <mrow>
             <mi>d</mi>
             <mo>⁢</mo>
             <mi>t</mi>
            </mrow>
           </mfrac>
           <mo>=</mo>
           <mfrac>
            <mrow>
             <mrow>
              <mi>t</mi>
              <mo>⁢</mo>
              <mfrac>
               <mrow>
                <mi>d</mi>
                <mo>⁢</mo>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>v</mi>
                 <mo>⁡</mo>
                 <mo>(</mo>
                 <mi>t</mi>
                 <mo>)</mo>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mrow>
                <mi>d</mi>
                <mo>⁢</mo>
                <mi>t</mi>
               </mrow>
              </mfrac>
             </mrow>
